name: Afera, The European Adhesive Tape Association
goal: Afera strives to be the voice of the European adhesive tape industry.Our vision is a world in which designers, engineers and manufacturers in every conceivable industry are aware of adhesive tape as the most effective, innovative and economical bonding and fixing solution to their needs.
interests: Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
REACH
BREF STS
Harmonized EU measure for printed food contact materials
Ecodesign for electronic devices
